headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://firebase.googleapis.com https://identitytoolkit.googleapis.com https://firestore.googleapis.com https://www.google-analytics.com https://www.googletagmanager.com; connect-src https://firebase.googleapis.com https://identitytoolkit.googleapis.com https://firestore.googleapis.com https://www.google-analytics.com https://www.googletagmanager.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' https://res.cloudinary.com; frame-src 'self' *.google.com
